docs.snippet: DUBOFSKY--Robert. January 31, 2014. The employees of BWD (Blumencranz, Wilkins and Dubofsky) are stunned and deeply saddened by the loss of our friend and colleague. Bob was a driving force at BWD and will be deeply missed by all. Bob and his son ...
docs.lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. January 31, 2014. The employees of BWD (Blumencranz, Wilkins and Dubofsky) are stunned and deeply saddened by the loss of our friend and colleague. Bob was a driving force at BWD and will be deeply missed by all. Bob and his son Ned joined BWD more than two decades ago and worked with many of us over the years. We can't imagine BWD without Bob. Our heartfelt sympathy goes out to his wife Betsy, to his son and partner Ned and wife Lyndsay, and all of Bob's family.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ELKIND, VAN GELDER, MARGARET

docs.snippet: ELKIND-VAN GELDER--Margaret, died of cancer on January 30, 2014 at the age of 52. Beloved wife of Todd Van Gelder, adoring mother to Eric and Will Van Gelder and loving sister to Elisabeth and Sam Elkind, she was predeceased by her parents, Charlo...
docs.lead_paragraph: ELKIND-VAN GELDER--Margaret, died of cancer on January 30, 2014 at the age of 52. Beloved wife of Todd Van Gelder, adoring mother to Eric and Will Van Gelder and loving sister to Elisabeth and Sam Elkind, she was predeceased by her parents, Charlotte and Morton Digby Elkind. Born in Brooklyn, NY, she attended Packer, Spence, Wesleyan and Bank Street and had various jobs in the education field before moving to Brookeville, MD where her primary focus was her family and her many friends from every stage of her life. Memorial: Saturday, February 15th at noon, The Inn at Brookeville Farms, 19501 Georgia Ave., Brookeville, MD.

docs.snippet: DUBOFSKY--Robert. January 31, 2014 at the age of 74. Our friend and esteemed colleague Bob will be greatly missed by all of us who had the honor of knowing him. Bob was extremely successful in life and as smart as they come, hardworking and charis...
docs.lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. January 31, 2014 at the age of 74. Our friend and esteemed colleague Bob will be greatly missed by all of us who had the honor of knowing him. Bob was extremely successful in life and as smart as they come, hardworking and charismatic. Our loving sympathy goes out to his wife Betsy, his children Ned and Nancy and their spouses Lyndsay and Stephen. Bob also leaves behind four beautiful grandchildren, Casey, Charlie, Michael and Matthew who were the light of his life. All of the members of our families are devastated by this loss. With profound sadness, The Blumencranz and Wilkins Families

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FREIDES, BARBARA GREENE

docs.snippet: FREIDES--Barbara Greene, long time resident of Larchmont, NY, passed away peacefully February 1st, 2014. She was 78 years old. Barbara was born to Henry and Augusta Greene on November 25th, 1935, in Brooklyn, NY before moving to Kew Garden Hills a...
docs.lead_paragraph: FREIDES--Barbara Greene, long time resident of Larchmont, NY, passed away peacefully February 1st, 2014. She was 78 years old. Barbara was born to Henry and Augusta Greene on November 25th, 1935, in Brooklyn, NY before moving to Kew Garden Hills and then Forest Hills for her teenage years and young adult years. She then settled in Mamaroneck and then Larchmont, NY. She was predeceased by her husband, Jack Freides, whom she married November 23rd, 1961. He died on March 1st, 2006. She is survived by her loving sister Sybil Goldman; sons Drew Freides and Randy (Judy) Freides; along with her two cherished grandchildren, Rebecca and Adam Freides. She was first and foremost a devoted wife and mother, but also worked as an accountant for over 50 years, until she retired only last year. Her passion was traveling the world, which took her to almost every continent. Contributions in lieu of flowers, can be made to the Westchester Jewish Center, 175 Rockland Ave, Mamaroneck, NY 10543.

docs.snippet: DUBOFSKY--Robert, one of our oldest and dearest friends, left us on January 31, 2014. He was a true gentleman and a genuine human being. We cherish all the years of laughs, fun and great experiences our two families had together. Our deepest condo...
docs.lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert, one of our oldest and dearest friends, left us on January 31, 2014. He was a true gentleman and a genuine human being. We cherish all the years of laughs, fun and great experiences our two families had together. Our deepest condolences to Betsy, Nancy, Ned and all the family. Marion, Jerry, Jodi and Andrew Sussman

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUBOFSKY, ROBERT L

docs.snippet: DUBOFSKY--Robert L. We mourn the loss of our dear friend Bob, admired by all for his loyalty, generosity and kindness. Our deepest, heartfelt sympathy and love to Betsy, Ned, Lindsay, Nancy, Stephen, Matthew, Michael, Casey and Charlie. Joanne and...
docs.lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert L. We mourn the loss of our dear friend Bob, admired by all for his loyalty, generosity and kindness. Our deepest, heartfelt sympathy and love to Betsy, Ned, Lindsay, Nancy, Stephen, Matthew, Michael, Casey and Charlie. Joanne and Michael

docs.snippet: DUBOFSKY--Robert, Our family is heartbroken by the sudden loss of Bob, our dear friend for over 60 years. Our families' love and friendship has spanned four generations. Our lives will never be the same without him. Our deepest, heartfelt condolen...
docs.lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert, Our family is heartbroken by the sudden loss of Bob, our dear friend for over 60 years. Our families' love and friendship has spanned four generations. Our lives will never be the same without him. Our deepest, heartfelt condolences to Betsy, Ned, Lindsay, Nancy, Stephen, Casey, Charlie, Matthew and Michael. Lorraine Sosnow-Aaron, Horowitz and Beer Families
